name: Junkship Turbo
description:
Controls:
Move with your Mouse
Click to detach all blocks and receive an attack bonus.

It's your classic side-scrolling shooter where your weapons arrive as pieces that attach to your ship. Getting hit anywhere on your ship will cause a game over, so watch your ship's body as it grows! Break off the pieces in an emergency, or use it offensively with the temporary attack bonus from detaching.

Credits:
Music: Juhani Junkala https://opengameart.org/content/5-chiptunes-action

Created during the GMTK Game Jam 2021
